snippet.description:
please do not imitate the abdominal punching training in this video, my friends in this video is a professional boxer, the teacher is very experienced, so they dare to train like this.
*why they need to do the abdominal punching or gut-punching training?*
Because boxer is going to get hit in the stomach in the ring! abdominal punching training is actually good training to make sure you can take a punch to the mid-section. You learn how and when to tighten up and relax. The same reason boxers used old-time medicine balls ( hard rubber balls thrown against their stomachs) it built up resistance to punches and muscle fitness to their fitness. it does makes the abdominal muscles stronger
the other reason is boxer getting hit is part of the game, and it's easier and safer to train getting hit in the stomach than it is to practice getting hit in the head, understanding how to absorb a hit in the stomach is a great skill to have as a fighter.
once again, do not imitate this training, this training is totally harmless for the professional boxer, but for the people who never train like this before is damaged.
snippet.title: belly of steel | Chinese kungfu master intense abdominal punch training 2
